effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 857,651 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 319,056.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: You are one of the devout. Your spells and abilities have a chance of burning a nearby enemy for 372,739 Radiant damage and healing another devout ally for that amount.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,345 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
